bestBHT.bht: A house divided against itself falleth, a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself. Jesus knew that they were trying to tempt him and saw their thoughts, just as Matthew records in his Gospel. The divided kingdom, like a family in which one part is opposed to the other, brings desolation and ruin to everyone involved. Just as one tumbling house knocks down its neighbor, a kingdom divided against itself is brought to ruin and desolation, like the kingdom of Satan would be if there was a division within it.

Henry Alford: 17.] knowing their thoughts: so Matthew also, ver. 25.
Marvin Vincent: A house divided against itself falleth."
The divided kingdom is brought to desolation, and its families and households in their party strifes are brought to ruin."
One house shall fall upon another.
Archibald T. Robertson: Knowing their thoughts... Jesus knew that they were trying to tempt him.
And a house divided against a house falleth... a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself.
One tumbling house knocking down its neighbour, a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself.
John Gill: Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation...so it would in the kingdom of Satan, was there in it a division.
A family, in which one part is opposed to the other, issues in the ruin of both.
An house divided from the foundation falls.
John Wesley: A house — That is, a family.

bhtAttempts.bht: A house divided against itself falleth, a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself. Jesus knew that they were trying to tempt him and saw their thoughts, just as Matthew records in his Gospel. The divided kingdom, like a family in which one part is opposed to the other, brings desolation and ruin to everyone involved. Just as one tumbling house knocks down its neighbor, a kingdom divided against itself is brought to ruin and desolation, like the kingdom of Satan would be if there was a division within it. Even a house, if divided from the foundation, falls.

A house divided against itself falleth, a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself. Jesus knew that they were trying to tempt him and saw their thoughts, just as Matthew records in his Gospel. The divided kingdom, like a family in which one part is opposed to the other, brings desolation and ruin to everyone involved. Just as one tumbling house knocks down its neighbor, a kingdom divided against itself is brought to ruin and desolation, like the kingdom of Satan would be if there was a division within it.

A house divided against itself falleth, illustrating the consequences of a kingdom being divided against itself. Jesus could discern their thoughts, revealing that they were attempting to tempt him. Similar to a family with opposing factions, divisions within a kingdom result in desolation and ruin. Just as one tumbling house can knock down its neighbor, a kingdom that lacks unity crumbles into ruin, mirroring the potential fate of Satan's kingdom if it were divided.

A house divided against itself falleth, a graphic picture of what happens when a kingdom is divided against itself. Jesus knew that they were trying to tempt him and saw their thoughts, just as Matthew records in his Gospel. The divided kingdom, like a family in which one part is opposed to the other, brings desolation and ruin to everyone involved. Just as one tumbling house knocks down its neighbor, a kingdom divided against itself is brought to ruin and desolation, like the kingdom of Satan would be if there was a division within it.

A house divided against itself falleth, illustrating the consequences of a kingdom being divided against itself. Jesus could discern their thoughts and knew they were trying to tempt him. Divisions within a kingdom result in desolation and ruin, similar to a family with opposing factions. Just as one tumbling house can knock down its neighbor, a kingdom lacking unity crumbles into ruin. This is a graphic depiction of what would happen if there was a division within the kingdom of Satan.
